snippet.title: Fallen Tear: The Ascension | In depth view with commentary gameplay
snippet.description:
Fallen Tear: The Ascension is a single player 2d platform Metroidvania and JRPG fusion about restoring balance to a fading world ruined by corrupted gods.

Follow our kickstarter page now to get notified on launch:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fallentearascension/fallen-tear-the-ascension-high-fantasy-jrpg-metroidvania/

Wishlist us now on #steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1446900?utm_source=yt&utm_campaign=comment&utm_content=commentary

#Metroidvania #FallenTear #IndieGames #gamedev #steamgame #jrpg #indiedev
